comments:
this is found in build 1.2.0 (v20070522-2005)

Steps:
1. start EPF with OpenUP
2. do a XML export
3. create a new library
4. do an XML import using the exported file in step2
5. import works fine without error
6. create a new plugin (plugin1 references openup_basic and basic_concept)
7. create a config (config1 that includes all three plugins)
8. repeate step 4 with default options
9. import hung and cannot finish (it seems in looping and cpu reaches 100%)

Looks like this is to do with an editor view not getting closed before the import. If all the editor views are closed, then the problem does not occur.

Btw, I was getting the following exception when the problem occurs.

Jeff, can you take a look? It is likely related to the editor view auto-closing change in the wizard code. Thanks

Fixed.

The SaveAllEditorsPage was not behaving properly - it now closes the editors as expected.

to reproduce the problem, use the lib and export files under
\\rmcbox\team\ForLong\bugs\189202
